text: Nine Hours to Rama is a 1963 British American drama movie directed by Mark Robson and is based on the 1962 novel of the same name by Stanley Wolpert. It stars Horst Buchholz, Diane Baker, Jose Ferrer, Robert Morley and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1963 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Nine Hours to Rama
